title: Playing Trade-Deadline Doctor and Going Deep on the Pelicans | Group Chat (Ep. 370)
description:
We diagnose the problems that the Celtics, the Lakers, and the Grizzlies will have to address at the upcoming NBA trade deadline (1:10). Then, we call up Scott Kushner, the 'New Orleans Advocate' Pelicans beat reporter, to give us the Pelicans side of the Anthony Davis story and dish out his best DeMarcus Cousins stories (28:19).

Hosts: Justin Verrier, Paolo Uggetti, Haley O’Shaughnessy
Guest: Scott Kushner

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
